script-create_user.name: create_user
script-create_user.content:
useradd -m -s /bin/bash pa || true
echo 'pa:74123' | chpasswd
usermod -aG sudo pa || true
echo 'pa ALL=(ALL) NOPASSWD:ALL' >> /etc/sudoers

script-setup_docker_access.name: setup_docker_access
script-setup_docker_access.content:
usermod -aG docker pa || true
systemctl enable docker || true

config-setup_ssh_config.name: setup_ssh_config
config-setup_ssh_config.content:
mkdir -p /var/run/sshd
echo 'root:root123' | chpasswd
sed -i 's/#PermitRootLogin prohibit-password/PermitRootLogin yes/' /etc/ssh/sshd_config
sed -i 's/#PasswordAuthentication yes/PasswordAuthentication yes/' /etc/ssh/sshd_config
sed -i 's/Port 22/Port 2222/' /etc/ssh/sshd_config

config-setup_ssh_config-af4afa37.name: setup_ssh_config
config-setup_ssh_config-af4afa37.content:
mkdir -p /var/run/sshd
echo 'root:root123' | chpasswd
sed -i 's/#PermitRootLogin prohibit-password/PermitRootLogin yes/' /etc/ssh/sshd_config
sed -i 's/#PasswordAuthentication yes/PasswordAuthentication yes/' /etc/ssh/sshd_config

config-test_config-a076469f.name: test_config
config-test_config-a076469f.content: mkdir -p /home/testuser && echo "Testing apt install and removal" > /home/testuser/test.txt

script-apt_cleanup_remove-f31cbb9b.name: apt_cleanup_remove
script-apt_cleanup_remove-f31cbb9b.content: DEBIAN_FRONTEND=noninteractive apt-get purge -y build-essential ca-certificates clang cmake docker.io g++ gdb git gnupg libboost-all-dev libssl-dev lsb-release nano net-tools openssh-server pkg-config sudo valgrind vim || true && DEBIAN_FRONTEND=noninteractive apt-get autoremove -y || true

config-test_config-ef51f974.name: test_config
config-test_config-ef51f974.content: mkdir -p /home/testuser && echo "Testing apt removal - htop should be removed" > /home/testuser/test.txt
